long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As front-end developers, we often need to write something down for later use, just so we won't forget, or maybe save some data for debugging.

A new note can be added by clicking on the New Note button on the popup or any selected text can be saved by clicking the right mouse button and Save as note option.

How to use the extension:

 Inside the popup:
  - Red button for delete
  - Green button for saving to clipboard
  - Input to change the note content ( saves instantly the changes )

 Additional context menu ( right mouse click )
  - Add as note will save the selected text as a new note to your list
  - QuickPaste will paste the selected note content to the input on which the right mouse button 
    was clicked
